text: Gilbert Harman (May 26, 1938 – November 13, 2021)Harman, Elizabeth (2005), "Harman, Gilbert Helms (1938–)", in The Dictionary of Modern American Philosophers, Continuum, [republished in The Bloomsbury Encyclopedia of Philosophers in America: From 1600 to the Present (2016)]. was an American philosopher. He taught at Princeton University from 1963 until his retirement in 2017. He co-directed the Princeton University Cognitive Science Laboratory. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American philosophers Category:Princeton University faculty Category:Scientists from New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:People from East Orange, New Jersey
title: Gilbert Harman
